name: @fnando/cnpj
description: Validate, generate and format CNPJ numbers

scripts.js:dist: tsc -m es6 --outDir es --target es6 && mv es/index.js es/index.mjs
scripts.js:dist:web: webpack --entry ./es/index.mjs --output-path ./web --output-filename cnpj.min.js --mode production --target web --output-library CNPJ --output-library-export var --devtool source-map
scripts.dist: rm -rf {es,commonjs,web} && yarn test && yarn js:dist && yarn js:dist:web && yarn js:dist:node

author: Nando Vieira <me@fnando.com>
